DOC.brief_summary: The investigators test the hypothesis that different beta-blockers had a different influence on chemoreceptor response and lung diffusion capacity. Both could influence exercise capacity in normoxic as well as hypoxic conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Nebivolol Versus Bisoprolol Versus Carvedilol in Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: Chronic heart failure patients in stable clinical condition No comorbidity NYHA class IV
